DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , open-label , study TGR-1202 , PI3K delta inhibitor , administer single agent Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) patient intolerant prior BTK inhibitor ( ibrutinib , ) prior PI3K delta inhibitor ( idelalisib , )
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Efficacy Safety TGR-1202 Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Who Are Intolerant Prior Therapy
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) Discontinuation prior BTK inhibitor PI3K delta inhibitor due adverse event within prior 9 month Presence measurable disease Progression prior BTK PI3K delta inhibitor Prior treatment TGR1202 Richter 's transformation CLL transformation aggressive lymphoma
